data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 3
data.actual_result: You will see the page/menu behind the current one during the closing animation of the keyboard.
data.expected_result: You should see the normal background color of the modal/menu (in this case black for Quick Switcher)
data.short_description: Closing keyboard for any modal shows the page behind the modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any modal that can open the keyboard (open the Quick Switcher for example) - Close your keyboard - Observe the bottom part (the part where your keyboard is placed) while closing your keyboard very closely
